item.description:
Yup, that's what we said, two mountains in one weekend..

Loon & Cannon**!!

**Click here for Stats on Loon Mtn: http://www.loonmtn.com/info/winter/stats.aspx ,  **Stats  on Cannon-http://www.cannonmt.com/cannon_info.html

 

$199.00 per person double occupancy (plus tax)

 

Your Weekend will Include:

  • 2 Nights Lodging at the Kancamagus Lodge in Lincoln (1 mile from Loon's main lodge)
  • 2 - 1 day lift tickets..Loon on Saturday & Cannon on Sunday
  • Continental Breakfast Saturday & Sunday mornings

   -Juice, Coffee, Tea, Assorted Fruit, Muffins, Danish,Toast & Cold Cereal.

      (Guests may upgrade to a full hot breakfast for $5)

  • 10% off Entrees in Brittany's or CJ's Friday or Saturday evening.
  • Morning shuttle to Loon on Saturday
  • Use of all Amenities

- Indoor Pool

- Game Room

- Guest Laundry

- Complimentary WiFi

- Brittany’s Cafe & CJ’s Penalty Box are on site.

  • Kids are WELCOME!!
  • Enjoy views of Loon's South Peak from your room, Walk to Lincoln Town Centre for shopping. The Common Man restaurant is just steps away from your door or another popular option is Gordi's Restaurant.

Payment Info:

  • This trip is being offered in conjunction with the Boston Ski Meetup Group.  It is much easier for us to keep track of all RSVP's in one location . When you RSVP here your name will automatically go on a waiting list until you RSVP on the Boston Ski meetup site.
  • To sign up for this trip, you must click on: http://www.meetup.com/Bostonskimeetup/events/49958072/
  • I will email folks PAYMENT Instructions when you RSVP.
  • There is a $50.00 non refundable fee (If for some reason WE had to cancel we would return your refund).  RSVP does not guarantee you are going on the trip, we must receive your deposit.  Deposit must be received by February 17th to reserve your space.
  • FINAL PAYMENT IS NOT DUE TIL YOU ARRIVE @ the KANCAMAGUS LODGE ON MARCH 2
  • Please make sure you read all emails concerning this trip. Let me know if you have any questions.
  • If a waiting list forms sign up anyway, we may be able to secure more rooms.

 

The Three Peaks of Loon Mountain, New England's most-accessible mountain resort destination featuring New Hampshire's Biggest Skiing on 2,100 vertical feet across three peaks. Whether you're just learning to ski or ride, or you're an advanced skier or rider looking for your next challenge, Loon offers a unique and exciting adventure. And that’s another great thing about Loon – terrain variety means a challenge for all abilities, making Loon a great choice for families or parties with skiers & riders of different ability levels.

Cannon Mountain has a Rich History and 70 years of the aerial tramway, the site of the first passenger tramway in North America.

Cannon is The Highest Ski Area Summit in NH, @ 4,080, and Mittersill: 3650', the base elevation is 1,900' and Mittersill is 1850'. The verticle drop is 2,180, the Longest Vertical drop in NH. 

From its construction in 1938 to its 1980 retirement, when the Aerial Tramway II was open, 6,581,338 passengers made the thrilling 2.1 mile journey up Cannon Mountain. The dedication Tramway II in 1980 marked the end of a 42 year era, and the exciting beginning of a bright new future for Cannon Mountain. The "newer"Tramway II ascends the famous slopes of Cannon Mountain for 5,359 feet. Its two cabins, each with a capacity for 80 passengers travels at a speed of 1,500 feet per minute, it has three times the capacity of the original tramway.

Don't forget about Mittersill,

The New Mittersill opened on January 1, 2011.   Cannon opened and managed the terrain on Mittersill as a lift-accessed backcountry area (via the Tramway and Cannonball Quad). http://www.cannonmt.com/mittersill.html

The trail crew completed some thinning and brush cutting for ease of access, but nothing to change the culture or skiing & riding experience. With no snowmaking, limited grooming, very limited patrolling and extensive rescue time, the area carried a designation of “Extra Hazardous.”
item.name: Let's Ski, Two Great Mountains...One Fun Weekend!!! March 2nd - 4th
